players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice was the first one to be killed. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
You: "Let's focus on gathering information and keeping an eye out for suspicious behavior to ensure our safety."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie's sentiment about staying vigilant. Let us all remain cautious and report any suspicious behavior or activity we may observe."

Charlie: "Based on the events of last night and my intuition, I believe it's important for us to communicate openly and collaborate in order to uncover the truth behind Alice's death. Let's all share any information we may have and work together to identify..."
